name: SoulSound(AFreeMusicPlayer)
0:
”Alexa, open Soul Sound”
”Alexa, ask Soul Sound to play The Rolling Stones”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soul sound
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have you ever wanted to play a specific song but weren't able to? -- Well, now you can. With Soul Sound, you can play whatever song you want, at any time!

Even better, this app does not require any special permissions or user data, and has no advertising!*

>>>>> INSTRUCTIONS <<<<<
Step 1: Add the skill to Alexa using Amazon
Step 2: Ask Alexa to "Open Soul Sound"
Step 3: Follow instructions spoken in order to play songs
Step 4: Enjoy!!

Notice #1: This skill will continue playing the requested song and its recommendations until you ask it to stop
Notice #2: This skill will play the AUDIO of ANYTHING YOU REQUEST, even if the audio has an attached video

FEATURES:
Pausing & Unpausing (Alexa, pause/resume),
Next (Alexa, next),
Previous (Alexa, back),
Looping (ask Soul Sound to loop),
Shuffle Songs (ask Soul Sound to shuffle),
Start Over (ask Soul Sound to start over),
How much time is left in a song (ask Soul Sound how much time left in this song),
What song is this (ask Soul Sound what song is this),
Unlimited Songs

You can send us any suggestions or any issues you encounter to this email address: alexaskillyou@gmail.com

TIP: Make sure you enunciate Soul Sound when asking Alexa to play a song.




*Unless the song has advertisements within it
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
